resp = client.indices.create(
    index="metrics_index",
    mappings={
        "properties": {
            "latency_histo": {
                "type": "histogram"
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.index(
    index="metrics_index",
    id="1",
    refresh=True,
    document={
        "network.name": "net-1",
        "latency_histo": {
            "values": [
                0.1,
                0.2,

            "counts": [

resp3 = client.search(
    index="metrics_index",
    size="0",
    filter_path="aggregations",
    aggs={
        "max_latency": {
            "max": {
                "field": "latency_histo"
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp3)
